column5: Got email from our outfitter in Nakina and was advised he never has had to cancel opening day flight due to weather but has fingers crossed for this year. He is still ice fishing. Doesn't look good. We are scheduled for week 2.
Well if week 2 is cancelled we are going to have a big picnic and camp out in your back yard, because I got most of the food and gear already!!!!
Joe better take the dog team and ice gear this year. Fred

Onetimedave We go to melchett the week before u guys, Christine told me the same thing to I got all my fingers crossed, but it's gunna rain today and get hot into the upper teens low twentys end of the month beginning of next, should help a lot Steve
